DOC.HEADLINE: THE WEEK AHEAD : VATICAN_CITY ; HOLY_WEEK UNDERWAY
DOC.TEXT: Holy_Week , the most important time of the year for the Roman_Catholic_Church , places Pope John Paul II at the center of time-honored rituals climaxing with his outdoor Mass in St . Peter ' s Square on Easter_Sunday . On Thursday , the 73-year-old Pope continues an Eastertide tradition by washing the feet of priests in the basilica of St . John Lateran . On Good_Friday , he hears confessions in St . Peter ' s . Saturday night , John Paul presides at a lengthy Easter vigil at St . Peter ' s . After the Easter Mass , transmitted to dozens of countries around the world , the pontiff will deliver his annual Urbi et Orbi message -- To the City and the World .
